attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! I was so exited for this app but when I downloaded it, it turned my phone into a Cheeto puff🙄! You might say that sounds ridiculous but nooo! Right after it turned into a Cheeto puff there was a big orange guy bursting through my door telling me he wants his Cheeto back.
attributes.title: Crusty Lips Trump

attributes.review: This is an honest review I got this app a couple seconds ago and my phone turned off. Is ThIs ApP a JoKe. Are you SeRiOuS? I should have listened to all the reviews and not got this app. The utter disappointment 🙄 anyway my only message is DONT GET THIS APP AND NEVER EVER TRUST APPS LIKE THIS EVER CAUSE ALL THEY ARE GONNA DO IS TURN YOUR PHONE OFF.
attributes.title: Why you shouldn’t get this app

attributes.review:
The Trump Administration app literally made my whole houses electricity go off. Do not recommend. also when i opened the app it made me take a survey asking very racist questions about various groups of people. not a good app. very bad. do not suggest downloading. 
- gen z
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: I have tried to save my purity and innocence for as long as I could. I made it 18 years without ever seeing anything unpure. Until today. This app should be banned because it has PORNOGRAPHIC content! This app took my eyes virginity and I want it back.
attributes.title: My eyes are no longer virgins

attributes.review: When I opened the app I was dumbfounded at what I was looking at it was the Cheeto. He had his underwear on and his hand in his pants while looking at me, I’m a minor. I am scared  then the app started glitching so I went out of it and the Cheeto was on my home and lock screen please send help!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: bunker boy is an insult to this country. Highly unsatisfied with this app, it’s full of racist and sexist material. I’m pretty sure the first time I opened the app, my phone literally said “aight imma head out” and the entire app crashed. Do not recommend (unless you or someone you love is a white supremacist)
attributes.title: Garbage spray tanned orange

attributes.review: I get spammed with text messages every few minutes about bs I don’t even want. I’m tired of seeing this app bash Democrats like they’re in the bad 24/7 when in reality they’re trying to change the government to make ALL people equal
attributes.title: Horrifying

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see when the next rally would be, after finding out my son and I went a couple of days later. At the end of the rally my son and I approached trump to shake his hand and congratulate him and bunker boy literally DROP KICKED my son across the room.
attributes.title: Canceled🧚👁👅👁

attributes.review: This app was not what I expected. My phone immediately started tweeting horrific slurs and threats. I had self tanner stains all over my hands after holding my phone for 2 minutes. I am so terrified after downloading this app!!!!
attributes.title: I can no longer hold a glass of water!

attributes.review: Trump is a big fat orange racist person and it’s not just that why do you think it right to ban tiktok from us to make us hate you even more  and why aren’t you worried about the case of Vanessa Guillen say her name or George Floyd say there name I’m not Hispanic but I fell your pain black and Hispanic lives matter ✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿✊🏼.
attributes.title: F *ck trump
